Step.Name: check db ${DbName} exists
Step.Script: SELECT COUNT(0) FROM sa_db_list() WHERE "Number" = db_id('${DbName}')

Step.Name: create db ${DbName}
Step.Script: CREATE DATABASE '${DbName}.db' DBA USER '${DbUser}' DBA PASSWORD '${DbPassword}' LOG ON '${DbName}.log'

Step.Name: create stored procedures
Step.Script: CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE ${Company}_SP_TRANSACTION_NOTIFICATION ( IN object_type nvarchar(30), --对象类型（BOCode） IN transaction_type nchar(1), --业务类型（Add:A-添加, Update:U-更新, Delete:D-删除） IN num_of_cols_in_key int, --主键个数 IN list_of_key_cols_tab_del nvarchar(255), --主键名称 IN list_of_cols_val_tab_del nvarchar(255), --主键值 IN user int --用户标识 ) RESULT ("Code" int, "Message" nvarchar(200)) BEGIN declare error_code int; --返回值(0 无错误) declare error_message nvarchar(200); --返回的消息 set error_code = 0; set error_message = N'OK'; -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- --ADD YOUR CODE HERE -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- --返回结果 select error_code "Code", error_message "Message"; END;
